job_tasks.phrase: The Solution Engineer is responsible for communicating a tailored view of our Service product offerings (Service Cloud) to customers and prospects.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the communication of product offerings, which is part of presenting a solution, aligning with the broader scope of integrating a product into a customer's environment.

job_tasks.phrase: The primary goal of our team is to remove all technical objections related to Service Cloud in the sales cycle and to highlight the business value that Service Cloud can bring to any business.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the role's focus on the technical aspects of a product (Service Cloud) within a sales context, aiming to overcome objections and demonstrate value, which is related to the integration and presentation of software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: solicit business requirements, develop a technical sales strategy, configure and optimally demonstrate the solutions that address these requirements and demonstrate business value.
job_tasks.justification: This describes core activities of understanding customer needs, planning a technical approach, and configuring/demonstrating a solution, which falls under the umbrella of software development and integration in a pre-sales context.

job_tasks.phrase: The Service Cloud Solution Engineer will collaborate on multi-functional initiatives and with other international teams to move the business forward.
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration on initiatives and with other teams to advance business goals is a common aspect of software development and integration projects.

job_tasks.phrase: Promoting Service Cloud value to customers (including c-level execs and IT) and field teams;
job_tasks.justification: Communicating the value of a service/product to various stakeholders is part of the integration and adoption process.

job_tasks.phrase: Business requirements assessment and delivery of findings including key difficulties, proposed solutions to meet business needs, and return on investment where applicable;
job_tasks.justification: Assessing requirements and proposing solutions is a fundamental step in the software development and integration lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Development of a technical sales strategy;
job_tasks.justification: Developing a strategy for the technical aspects of a sale aligns with the broader scope of software integration and solution delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Convey confidence in using AI within cloud based applications
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding and communicating the application of AI within existing software, fitting into the integration aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: Configuring and optimally demonstrating our solutions in a way that closely reflects each customer's business (tailored demonstrations);
job_tasks.justification: Configuring and demonstrating solutions to match customer needs is a direct application of software integration principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Discussing and proposing solution architecture that includes common call centre infrastructure integration, back-office system integration, and workflow process definition;
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions discussing and proposing solution architecture involving integration with various systems, which is a core part of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Working well in a matrix organisation, including account executives, csg consultants and implementation partners;
job_tasks.justification: Working effectively within a matrix organization with various teams is a common requirement for successful software integration projects.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement enablement activities (Webinars, Best Practices, Knowledge Share, etc.)
job_tasks.justification: Implementing enablement activities, such as knowledge sharing, supports the adoption and integration of solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: The Service Cloud Solution Engineer works closely with Sales teams and Service Cloud Account Executives, their peers, and product management to deliver the appropriate solution and establish credibility and trust with the customer.
job_tasks.justification: Working closely with various teams to deliver solutions and build trust is integral to the software integration process.

soft_skills.phrase: The Solution Engineer is responsible for communicating a tailored view of our Service product offerings (Service Cloud) to customers and prospects.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the communication aspect of the role in presenting product offerings.

soft_skills.phrase: The successful candidate should possess thought leadership, technical and business acumen, credibility and rapport.
soft_skills.justification: Possessing credibility and rapport directly relates to effective communication and collaboration with clients.

soft_skills.phrase: The Solution Engineer will collaborate on multi-functional initiatives and with other international teams to move the business forward.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with various teams.

soft_skills.phrase: Promoting Service Cloud value to customers (including c-level execs and IT) and field teams;
soft_skills.justification: Promoting value to diverse stakeholders requires strong communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Working well in a matrix organisation, including account executives, csg consultants and implementation partners;
soft_skills.justification: Working effectively in a matrix organization implies strong collaboration and communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Implement enablement activities (Webinars, Best Practices, Knowledge Share, etc.)
soft_skills.justification: Knowledge sharing activities require effective communication.

soft_skills.justification: Working closely with teams and establishing trust necessitates strong communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: solicit business requirements, develop a technical sales strategy, configure and optimally demonstrate the solutions that address these requirements and demonstrate business value.
soft_skills.justification: Soliciting requirements, developing strategies, and configuring solutions to meet needs are all problem-solving activities.

soft_skills.phrase: Business requirements assessment and delivery of findings including key difficulties, proposed solutions to meet business needs, and return on investment where applicable;
soft_skills.justification: Assessing business needs, identifying difficulties, and proposing solutions are core problem-solving tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: Discussing and proposing solution architecture that includes common call centre infrastructure integration, back-office system integration, and workflow process definition;
soft_skills.justification: Proposing solution architecture to address integration challenges is a problem-solving activity.

soft_skills.phrase: The Service Cloud Solution Engineer will develop and lead programs crafted to accelerate the growth of the Service Cloud business.
soft_skills.justification: Developing and leading programs to drive business growth indicates innovation and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on communicating, configuring, and demonstrating a product (Service Cloud) that uses AI, rather than developing or fine-tuning AI models themselves. The tasks are primarily related to integrating and presenting AI capabilities within a broader software solution in a sales context. There is no mention of core AI/ML model development, prompt engineering, or RAG. Therefore, the role is classified as AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as it involves software engineering tasks (integration, demonstration, architecture) that are augmented by AI, but the core AI specialization is not the primary focus.

confidence.reasoning: The job description is very clear about the responsibilities of a Solution Engineer in a pre-sales capacity, focusing on demonstrating and integrating a product that leverages AI. The tasks align well with the definition of 'Software Development & Integration' and the role's focus is clearly on the application and presentation of AI within a cloud-based service, not on core AI/ML development. This makes the classification straightforward.
